title: An Act relative to home investments

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Cronin, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 705) of John J. Cronin for legislation to require a shared equity investor to have a license with respect to residential property.  Financial Services.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Financial Services
